name: Test Drive Off-Road Wide Open
summary: Test Drive Off-Road ? Wide Open gives you brute force off-road racing through nature's untamed badlands. Twelve kick-ass trucks fight for off-road supremacy in the wide open wilderness. Prove your skills in a Hummer, Dodge T-Rex, Ford Bronco, and more. Take towering jumps at high speeds in your unstoppable trucks. Grab your guts and hold on, because this one gets rough!
